airballoon.name: Air Balloon
airballoon.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.

brightpowder.name: Bright Powder
brightpowder.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opponent's accuracy.

eviolite.name: Eviolite
eviolite.description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def if the holder can still evolve.

floatstone.name: Float Stone
floatstone.description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

destinyknot.name: Destiny Knot
destinyknot.description: A long, thin, bright-red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, so does the foe.

rockyhelmet.name: Rocky Helmet
rockyhelmet.description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

assaultvest.name: Assault Vest
assaultvest.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

safetygoggles.name: Safety Goggles
safetygoggles.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. They protect the holder from weather-related damage and powder.

protectivepads.name: Protective Pads
protectivepads.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. They protect the holder from effects caused by making contact.

heavy-dutyboots.name: Heavy-Duty Boots
heavy-dutyboots.description: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

utilityumbrella.name: Utility Umbrella
utilityumbrella.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of rain and sun.

ejectbutton.name: Eject Button
ejectbutton.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

ejectpack.name: Eject Pack
ejectpack.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

redcard.name: Red Card
redcard.description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

shedshell.name: Shed Shell
shedshell.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace lets the holder switch out of battle without fail.

smokeball.name: Smoke Ball
smokeball.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.

luckyegg.name: Lucky Egg
luckyegg.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.

exp.share.name: Exp. Share
exp.share.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder gets a share of a battle's Exp. Points without battling.

amuletcoin.name: Amulet Coin
amuletcoin.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle's prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

soothebell.name: Soothe Bell
soothebell.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

cleansetag.name: Cleanse Tag
cleansetag.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

choiceband.name: Choice Band
choiceband.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband ups Attack, but allows the use of only one move.

choicespecs.name: Choice Specs
choicespecs.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but allows the use of only one move.

choicescarf.name: Choice Scarf
choicescarf.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This scarf boosts Speed but allows the use of only one move.

heatrock.name: Heat Rock
heatrock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.

damprock.name: Damp Rock
damprock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

smoothrock.name: Smooth Rock
smoothrock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.

icyrock.name: Icy Rock
icyrock.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.

terrainextender.name: Terrain Extender
terrainextender.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder.

lightclay.name: Light Clay
lightclay.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

gripclaw.name: Grip Claw
gripclaw.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

bindingband.name: Binding Band
bindingband.description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

bigroot.name: Big Root
bigroot.description: A Pokémon held item that boosts the power of HP-stealing moves to let the holder recover more HP.

blacksludge.name: Black Sludge
blacksludge.description: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

leftovers.name: Leftovers
leftovers.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is gradually restored during battle.

shellbell.name: Shell Bell
shellbell.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.

mentalherb.name: Mental Herb
mentalherb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It snaps the holder out of infatuation. It can be used only once.

whiteherb.name: White Herb
whiteherb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It restores any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

powerherb.name: Power Herb
powerherb.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges up first.

absorbbulb.name: Absorb Bulb
absorbbulb.description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

cellbattery.name: Cell Battery
cellbattery.description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

luminousmoss.name: Luminous Moss
luminousmoss.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit by a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

snowball.name: Snowball
snowball.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit by an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

weaknesspolicy.name: Weakness Policy
weaknesspolicy.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if hit by a move it's weak to.

blunderpolicy.name: Blunder Policy
blunderpolicy.description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

throatspray.name: Throat Spray
throatspray.description: Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

adrenalineorb.name: Adrenaline Orb
adrenalineorb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.

roomservice.name: Room Service
roomservice.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowers Speed when Trick Room takes effect.

electricseed.name: Electric Seed
electricseed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

grassyseed.name: Grassy Seed
grassyseed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

mistyseed.name: Misty Seed
mistyseed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

psychicseed.name: Psychic Seed
psychicseed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

lifeorb.name: Life Orb
lifeorb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

expertbelt.name: Expert Belt
expertbelt.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: A Pokémon held item that boosts a move used consecutively. Its effect is reset if another move is used.

muscleband.name: Muscle Band
muscleband.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.

wiseglasses.name: Wise Glasses
wiseglasses.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.

razorclaw.name: Razor Claw
razorclaw.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder's critical-hit ratio.

scopelens.name: Scope Lens
scopelens.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a lens that boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

widelens.name: Wide Lens
widelens.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

zoomlens.name: Zoom Lens
zoomlens.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target, its accuracy will be boosted.

king'srock.name: King's Rock
king'srock.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder inflicts damage, the target may flinch.

razorfang.name: Razor Fang
razorfang.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may make foes and allies flinch when the holder inflicts damage.

laggingtail.name: Lagging Tail
laggingtail.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

quickclaw.name: Quick Claw
quickclaw.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A light, sharp claw that lets the bearer move first occasionally.

focusband.name: Focus Band
focusband.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

focussash.name: Focus Sash
focussash.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

flameorb.name: Flame Orb
flameorb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

toxicorb.name: Toxic Orb
toxicorb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

stickybarb.name: Sticky Barb
stickybarb.description: A held item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to Pokémon that touch the holder.

ironball.name: Iron Ball
ironball.description: A Pokémon held item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.

ringtarget.name: Ring Target
ringtarget.description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.

machobrace.name: Macho Brace
machobrace.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stiff, heavy brace that promotes strong growth but lowers Speed.

powerweight.name: Power Weight
powerweight.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

powerbracer.name: Power Bracer
powerbracer.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

powerbelt.name: Power Belt
powerbelt.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

powerlens.name: Power Lens
powerlens.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

powerband.name: Power Band
powerband.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

poweranklet.name: Power Anklet
poweranklet.description: A Pokémon held item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.

laxincense.name: Lax Incense
laxincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The tricky aroma of this incense may make attacks miss the holder.

fullincense.name: Full Incense
fullincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

luckincense.name: Luck Incense
luckincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle's prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

pureincense.name: Pure Incense
pureincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

seaincense.name: Sea Incense
seaincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

waveincense.name: Wave Incense
waveincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

roseincense.name: Rose Incense
roseincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

oddincense.name: Odd Incense
oddincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

rockincense.name: Rock Incense
rockincense.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

charcoal.name: Charcoal
charcoal.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

mysticwater.name: Mystic Water
mysticwater.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups the power of Water-type moves.

magnet.name: Magnet
magnet.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

miracleseed.name: Miracle Seed
miracleseed.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a seed imbued with life that ups the power of Grass-type moves.

never-meltice.name: Never-Melt Ice
never-meltice.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a piece of ice that repels heat and boosts Ice-type moves.

blackbelt.name: Black Belt
blackbelt.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a belt that boosts determination and Fighting-type moves.

poisonbarb.name: Poison Barb
poisonbarb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a small, poisonous barb that ups the power of Poison-type moves.

softsand.name: Soft Sand
softsand.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

sharpbeak.name: Sharp Beak
sharpbeak.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

twistedspoon.name: Twisted Spoon
twistedspoon.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a spoon imbued with telekinetic power that boosts Psychic-type moves.

silverpowder.name: Silver Powder
silverpowder.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a shiny, silver powder that ups the power of Bug-type moves.

hardstone.name: Hard Stone
hardstone.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an unbreakable stone that ups the power of Rock-type moves.

spelltag.name: Spell Tag
spelltag.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

dragonfang.name: Dragon Fang
dragonfang.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a hard and sharp fang that ups the power of Dragon-type moves.

blackglasses.name: Black Glasses
blackglasses.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a shady-looking pair of glasses that boosts Dark-type moves.

metalcoat.name: Metal Coat
metalcoat.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a special metallic film that ups the power of Steel-type moves.

silkscarf.name: Silk Scarf
silkscarf.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

flameplate.name: Flame Plate
flameplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

splashplate.name: Splash Plate
splashplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

zapplate.name: Zap Plate
zapplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

meadowplate.name: Meadow Plate
meadowplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

icicleplate.name: Icicle Plate
icicleplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

fistplate.name: Fist Plate
fistplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

toxicplate.name: Toxic Plate
toxicplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

earthplate.name: Earth Plate
earthplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

skyplate.name: Sky Plate
skyplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

mindplate.name: Mind Plate
mindplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

insectplate.name: Insect Plate
insectplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.

stoneplate.name: Stone Plate
stoneplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

spookyplate.name: Spooky Plate
spookyplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

dracoplate.name: Draco Plate
dracoplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

dreadplate.name: Dread Plate
dreadplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

ironplate.name: Iron Plate
ironplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

pixieplate.name: Pixie Plate
pixieplate.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

firegem.name: Fire Gem
firegem.description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move only once.

watergem.name: Water Gem
watergem.description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move only once.

electricgem.name: Electric Gem
electricgem.description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move only once.

grassgem.name: Grass Gem
grassgem.description: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move only once.

icegem.name: Ice Gem
icegem.description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move only once.

fightinggem.name: Fighting Gem
fightinggem.description: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move only once.

poisongem.name: Poison Gem
poisongem.description: A gem with an essence of poison. When held, it strengthens the power of a Poison-type move only once.

groundgem.name: Ground Gem
groundgem.description: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move only once.

flyinggem.name: Flying Gem
flyinggem.description: A gem with an essence of air. When held, it strengthens the power of a Flying-type move only once.

psychicgem.name: Psychic Gem
psychicgem.description: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move only once.

buggem.name: Bug Gem
buggem.description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move only once.

rockgem.name: Rock Gem
rockgem.description: A gem with an essence of rock. When held, it strengthens the power of a Rock-type move only once.

ghostgem.name: Ghost Gem
ghostgem.description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move only once.

dragongem.name: Dragon Gem
dragongem.description: A gem with a draconic essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

darkgem.name: Dark Gem
darkgem.description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move only once.

steelgem.name: Steel Gem
steelgem.description: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move only once.

fairygem.name: Fairy Gem
fairygem.description: A gem with an essence of the fey. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fairy-type move only once.

normalgem.name: Normal Gem
normalgem.description: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move only once.

lightball.name: Light Ball
lightball.description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It is a puzzling orb that raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stat.

luckypunch.name: Lucky Punch
luckypunch.description: An item to be held by Chansey. It is a pair of gloves that boosts Chansey's critical-hit ratio.

metalpowder.name: Metal Powder
metalpowder.description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

quickpowder.name: Quick Powder
quickpowder.description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

thickclub.name: Thick Club
thickclub.description: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It is a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.

leek.name: Leek
leek.description: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. It is a very long and stiff stalk of leek that boosts the critical-hit ratio.

souldew.name: Soul Dew
souldew.description: A wondrous orb to be held by either Latios or Latias. It raises the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves.

deepseatooth.name: Deep Sea Tooth
deepseatooth.description: An item to be held by Clamperl. A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it raises the Sp. Atk stat.

deepseascale.name: Deep Sea Scale
deepseascale.description: An item to be held by Clamperl. A scale that shines a faint pink, it raises the Sp. Def stat.

adamantorb.name: Adamant Orb
adamantorb.description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.

lustrousorb.name: Lustrous Orb
lustrousorb.description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.

griseousorb.name: Griseous Orb
griseousorb.description: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.

rustedsword.name: Rusted Sword
rustedsword.description: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

rustedshield.name: Rusted Shield
rustedshield.description: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

dousedrive.name: Douse Drive
dousedrive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move.

shockdrive.name: Shock Drive
shockdrive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move.

burndrive.name: Burn Drive
burndrive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move.

chilldrive.name: Chill Drive
chilldrive.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move.

firememory.name: Fire Memory
firememory.description: A memory disc containing Fire-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

watermemory.name: Water Memory
watermemory.description: A memory disc containing Water-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

electricmemory.name: Electric Memory
electricmemory.description: A memory disc containing Electric-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

grassmemory.name: Grass Memory
grassmemory.description: A memory disc containing Grass-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

icememory.name: Ice Memory
icememory.description: A memory disc containing Ice-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

fightingmemory.name: Fighting Memory
fightingmemory.description: A memory disc containing Fighting-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

poisonmemory.name: Poison Memory
poisonmemory.description: A memory disc containing Poison-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

groundmemory.name: Ground Memory
groundmemory.description: A memory disc containing Ground-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

flyingmemory.name: Flying Memory
flyingmemory.description: A memory disc containing Flying-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

psychicmemory.name: Psychic Memory
psychicmemory.description: A memory disc containing Psychic-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

bugmemory.name: Bug Memory
bugmemory.description: A memory disc containing Bug-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

rockmemory.name: Rock Memory
rockmemory.description: A memory disc containing Rock-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

ghostmemory.name: Ghost Memory
ghostmemory.description: A memory disc containing Ghost-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

dragonmemory.name: Dragon Memory
dragonmemory.description: A memory disc containing Dragon-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

darkmemory.name: Dark Memory
darkmemory.description: A memory disc containing Dark-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

steelmemory.name: Steel Memory
steelmemory.description: A memory disc containing Steel-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

fairymemory.name: Fairy Memory
fairymemory.description: A memory disc containing Fairy-type data. It changes the holder's type if held by a certain Pokémon.

everstone.name: Everstone
everstone.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

dragonscale.name: Dragon Scale
dragonscale.description: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.

venusaurite.name: Venusaurite
venusaurite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Venusaur hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

charizarditex.name: Charizardite X
charizarditex.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Charizard hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

charizarditey.name: Charizardite Y
charizarditey.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Charizard hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

blastoisinite.name: Blastoisinite
blastoisinite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Blastoise hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

beedrillite.name: Beedrillite
beedrillite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Beedrill hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

pidgeotite.name: Pidgeotite
pidgeotite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Pidgeot hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

alakazite.name: Alakazite
alakazite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Alakazam hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

slowbronite.name: Slowbronite
slowbronite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Slowbro hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

gengarite.name: Gengarite
gengarite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Gengar hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

kangaskhanite.name: Kangaskhanite
kangaskhanite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Kangaskhan hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

pinsirite.name: Pinsirite
pinsirite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Pinsir hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

gyaradosite.name: Gyaradosite
gyaradosite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Gyarados hold it, and it will be able to Mega Evolve.

redorb.name: Red Orb
redorb.description: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to be connected with the Hoenn region.

blueorb.name: Blue Orb
blueorb.description: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to be connected with the Hoenn region.

cheriberry.name: Cheri Berry
cheriberry.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from paralysis.

chestoberry.name: Chesto Berry
chestoberry.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.

pechaberry.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from poison.

rawstberry.description: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.

starfberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises one of its stats in a pinch.

enigmaberry.name: Enigma Berry
enigmaberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores its HP if it is hit by any supereffective attack.

micleberry.name: Micle Berry
micleberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises the accuracy of a move just once in a pinch.

custapberry.name: Custap Berry
custapberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.

jabocaberry.name: Jaboca Berry
jabocaberry.description: If held by a Pokémon and a physical attack lands, the attacker also takes damage.

rowapberry.name: Rowap Berry
rowapberry.description: If held by a Pokémon and a special attack lands, the attacker also takes damage.

keeberry.name: Kee Berry
keeberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Defense if it's hit with a physical move.

marangaberry.name: Maranga Berry
marangaberry.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Sp. Def if it's hit with a special move.
